Hi! My name is Dario.

And this is why I do what I do

Creating apps was not at all what I thought I would be doing or even know how to do but to my surprise it has become one of my passions. Learning how applications work and interact with the user as well as how different devices interact with them has opened my eyes and my mind to new ways of thinking about how to create a better user experience.

One of the reasons why I like to create apps is because unlike a web site you are meant to interact with the content on the device. This makes my job of creating those interactions more interesting and fun. Knowing that the user can go and explore every part of the application and be provided with a great blend of design and content where they might not even be aware of how much time was put into a small part to make everything from opening the app to closing it an amazing experience.

Get my CV

Chimera Studio is a mobile application development company founded by me and two of my friends. It currently has four apps under its name with more on the way.

It is a passion project which has the potential to become a big development company with innovative new designs and reimagined content for previously basic apps.

Right now we are using Apache Cordova (a web-based framework) to develop our apps. This enables us to quickly and easily, with the knowledge we currently possess, create apps for android, IOS and windows phone, all at the same time with little to no adjustment made between the OS versions.
